availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Seth P'Pool (Christian co., ky, farmer / Caldwell County Wagonmaker )

body.p: Caldwell County Kentucky, farmer and wagonmaker. Kentucky native. Son of Buckner P'Pool and Matilda P'Pool. Married to Sarah E. Dunning P'Pool in Trigg County, Kentucky, in November 1861. Father of Baird P'Pool and Eber H. P'Pool. Farmer in Christian County in 1850. Wagonmaker in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, District 1, p. 464A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Burnesville, p. 21.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, Wallonia, p. 157A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Trigg County Marriages, Film #000321335, p. 215.
